author: @latestly
title: Messi Saves the Day! Argentina Grandma Survives Hamas Attack by Talking About Lionel Messi (Watch Video) | üëç LatestLY
text: Mumbai, March 8: A 90-year-old woman who escaped being kidnapped by Hamas men during the October 7 attack on Israel credits her survival to her love of football and Lionel Messi. The grandmother's story was featured in a documentary that tells the harrowing tale of her kidnap and heartwarming escape. Esther Cunio, an Argentinian-Israeli grandmother living in Kibbutz Nir Oz, managed to distract a gunman who knocked on her door by telling him she was from the same country as the world-famous football star. The abductor, who was apparently a fan of Messi, then asked her to pose with his rifle and make a victory sign for a video that later went viral on social media. [ Israel-Hamas War: US To Build ‚ÄòTemporary Port‚Äô in Gaza for Humanitarian Aid, Joe Biden To Make Announcement During State of the Union Address](https://www.latestly.com/world/israel-hamas-war-us-to-build-temporary-port-in-gaza-for-humanitarian-aid-joe-biden-to-make-announcement-during-state-of-the-union-address-5807092.html). Messi Saves the Day! ‚Äî buni de repuesto (@BuniRepuesto) [March 7, 2024] How Argentine grandma Escapes Hamas attack Cunio‚Äôs story is one of the many harrowing tales of survival that will be featured in a new documentary called ‚ÄúVoces de 7 de octubre - Latino Stories of Survival‚Äù. The film, produced by Fuente Latina, a non-profit that works with Spanish media covering Israel, will document the atrocities of October 7 from the perspective of Israelis from Latin America who experienced it. Israel-Hamas War October 7 was the day when thousands of Hamas-led militants stormed across the border into Israel from the Gaza Strip by land, air and sea, killing some 1,200 people and seizing over 250 hostages, mostly civilians, many amid horrific acts of brutality and sexual assault. [Israel-Hamas War: 28,985 Palestinians Killed in Gaza Since October 7, Says Health Ministry](https://www.latestly.com/world/israel-hamas-war-28985-palestinians-killed-in-gaza-since-october-7-says-health-ministry-5767748.html). Eight members of Cunio‚Äôs extended family were among the captives, and two of them, her grandchildren Ariel and David Cunio, are still being held by terrorists in Gaza. David‚Äôs wife and their twin 3-year-old daughters were released as part of a weeklong truce in late November, as were his sister-in-law Danielle Aloni and her daughter Emilia. Ariel‚Äôs girlfriend, Arbel Yehud, 28, is also still in captivity. Cunio hopes that Messi, who plays for Paris Saint-Germain and the Argentinian national team, will hear about her ordeal and pray for her grandchildren‚Äôs safe return. ‚ÄúNow I would ask for my grandchildren, for my two grandchildren who are locked up there, and I would tell him to please pray to God, to send them‚Ä¶ that he tries to get them out because they are kids who are worth gold,‚Äù Cunio says in the film. (The above story first appeared on LatestLY on Mar 08, 2024 08:55 PM IST. For more news and updates on politics, world, sports, entertainment and lifestyle, log on to our website [latestly.com](https://www.latestly.com/)).

author: Natalie Soper, Dating Coach for Women
title: Magnetize Your Dream Man in 2024 - Online Workshop, San Diego, 8 January 2024
text:
Advertisement Embrace your feminine energy and attract the man of your dreams in our 2024. Online workshop - Become Magnetic!
About this Event
What you'll get:
The 4 elements to unleash your magnetic energy and match with your dream partner in 2024.
Elevate your standards and attract high value men.
A process to uncover the core of what's blocking you from love.
Imagine yourself...
Imagine matching with your ‚Äúo mg I‚Äôve waited all my life for you‚Äù dream partner. To get there...
Imagine your norm becomes a man saying ‚ÄúI‚Äôll pick you up at 6pm‚Äù and whisking you away on a magical, connecting experience.
Imagine attracting one high caliber man after another without even trying. You know there are an abundance of men who can‚Äôt wait to adore you!
Imagine having men put in effort to pursue you and get to know you. Nothing is off the table, all the way to luxury holidays as a second date (this has been offered to me by 5 men in the last 6 months!)
Imagine feeling deep down that you are the PRIZE , relaxing into deep trust knowing your soulmate is coming , and shining.
Imagine being the woman who walks in the room and people say ‚Äúwho is SHE?! üòç Introduce me!‚Äù
Imagine feeling relaxed and leaning back, while you magnetize your desires to you . You surrender to life and it surprises you in the most fabulous ways.
This is for you if‚Ä¶
Your dating life is‚Ä¶ what dating life?!
‚ÄãYou‚Äôd love to match with your dream partner, but keep repeating painful patterns with men.
You are attracting low effort men who make last minute plans and say ‚Äúlet‚Äôs chill, come over‚Äù.
You feel on-edge & frustrated with men.. Like you can‚Äôt trust them to get it right.
You think to yourself ‚Äúall the good men are gone‚Äù or ‚Äúmaybe there is no one for me‚Äù
You feel like you have to take control and push hard for most things in life.
Why you NEED this...
You‚Äôve been told a lie that your femininity is a weakness. A lie that to get what you want in life, you have to push hard for it.
What if I told you that this overload of masculine energy is actually pushing away one of your deepest desires - a masculine man who makes you feel taken care of and cherished.
Your femininity is actually your greatest superpower! I‚Äôll show you how to embrace this magnetic part of you. It‚Äôs already within you - you only need to remember it.
For all my clients this shift into the feminine has been so transformative! All of the sudden, you‚Äôll feel as though you are the sun in your universe, and men are orbiting you like the planets. Your dream partner will magnetise towards you with ease, while you feel soooo good in the process.
This is an ONLINE workshop. To join you must come LIVE! If you sign up, commit to showing up for your transformation.
I'm soooo excited to share this with you!!
P.s. feel free to learn more about me & connect on insta @natalie_soper Advertisement Event Venue & Nearby Stays San Diego, United States
Tickets USD 0.00

author: Our Reporters
title: NBC promotes clean environment with national tree planting initiative
text:
The Nigerian Bottling Company has restated its commitment to environmental sustainability by taking its tree planting initiative to six states and the Federal Capital Territory.
In a release, the brewer stated that it took the national tree planting programme to Lagos, Edo, Imo, Oyo States and the FCT to commemorate World Environment Day.
It added that the environmental initiative, centred around the theme of ‚ÄòLand Restoration, Desertification, and Drought Resilience‚Äô, saw NBC organise roadshows, rallies, lectures, and symposiums to raise awareness about the benefits of tree planting and its positive impact on climate change.
The NBC National Environment Manager, Temitope Ogunrinde, said the company prioritised environmental sustainability as a means to provide lasting solutions to the climate change crisis affecting Nigerian communities, and the planet due to land degradation, environmental hazards, food insecurity, and the loss of biodiversity and ecosystem services.
NBC‚Äôs Lagos campaign partnered with the Lagos State Parks and Gardens Agency, Lagos Waste Management Authority and Hope for Life Initiative to engage Oregun High School in Lagos to sensitise students on the importance of annual tree planting.
Ogunrinde encouraged the Oregun High School students to nurture and protect the newly planted trees and ensure they benefit current and future generations.
He said, ‚ÄúThrough our partnerships with the government and related agencies, private organisations, and our in-house sustainability initiatives, we will continue to curb environmental pollution and effect positive change nationwide.‚Äù
LAWMA‚Äôs MD, Muyiwa Gbadegeshin, represented by Victor Adedeji, emphasised the initiative‚Äôs role in providing students with practical tree-planting experience and raising climate change awareness.
The Assistant Director of LASPARK‚Äôs Tree Planting and Maintenance Department, Adebimpe Kuponu, also underscored the importance of ongoing tree-planting efforts in environmental preservation.
The NBC integrated local communities into the environmental solutions, encouraging Oyo State residents to participate in gardening activities to combat desertification.
The company donated tree seedlings in Benin, Edo State and organised a community cleanup exercise, while in Owerri, Imo State, it conducted a nature walk to emphasize land restoration measures aimed at protecting the environment from drought.
At the University of Lagos, the company collaborated with Coca-Cola to host an environmental sustainability challenge at the first anniversary of the Green Eco Hub.
According to NBC, 1.5 million plastic bottles were recovered in the environmental sustainability challenge.

organizations.name: lagos state parks and gardens agency

author: F_400990
title: Stunning view near expressway in E China‚Äôs Jiangxi - People's Daily Online
text: Photo shows a beautiful view near Xijiang village of Nanxin township, in Nanchang county, Nanchang city, the capital of east China's Jiangxi Province, and an expressway runs through here. (People's Daily Online/Zhu Haipeng) An expressway passing near Xijiang village of Nanxin township, in Nanchang county, Nanchang city, the capital of east China's Jiangxi Province, forms a harmonious view combining a modern landscape with rural scenery. White-walled and red-tiled farmhouses line the route, contrasting delightfully with the rice paddies as they transition from green to golden hues. Striving for high-quality development in urban transportation, Nanchang city has expedited the construction of a modern comprehensive transportation system. A multi-tiered transportation network that connects the urban and rural regions has taken shape, creating a convenient and efficient travel environment for the public. By implementing an integrated development model that links transportation with characteristic industries and tourism, Nanchang strengthens the role of rural highways in boosting the development of rural industries. A steady increase in the improvement of tourism roads, resource roads, and industry development roads has been a powerful force in the revitalization of rural areas. (Intern Xing Yawen contributed to this story.) Photos Related Stories [Wuyuan County in E China makes efforts to promote rural tourism](/n3/2024/0707/c90000-20190720.html) [Thrilling and beautiful Yizhao Highway](/n3/2024/0617/c90000-20182000.html) [Repairs to Dongting Lake dike completed after late-night effort](/n3/2024/0709/c90000-20191233.html) [Villagers harvest mat grass in E China‚Äôs Jiangxi](/n3/2024/0704/c90000-20189218.html) [East China's Jiangxi strives for high-quality development](/n3/2024/0517/c90000-20170942.html) [Tree-lined highway traverses China's largest desert](/n3/2024/0620/c90000-20183403.html) About People's Daily Online | Join Us | Contact Us Copyright ¬© 2024 People's Daily Online. ŸÖŸÜ ÿ¨Ÿáÿ™Ÿáÿßÿå ÿ£ŸÅÿßÿØÿ™ ÿ•ÿ∞ÿßÿπÿ© ÿßŸÑÿ¨Ÿäÿ¥ ÿßŸÑÿ•ÿ≥ÿ±ÿßÿ¶ŸäŸÑŸä ÿ£ŸÜ "ÿ¨Ÿäÿ¥ ÿßŸÑÿßÿ≠ÿ™ŸÑÿßŸÑ ÿßÿ≥ÿ™ŸÉŸÖŸÑ ÿπŸÖŸÑŸäÿ© ŸÅŸä ŸÇÿ±Ÿäÿ© ÿ®Ÿäÿ™ ÿ¨ŸÜ Ÿàÿßÿπÿ™ŸÇŸÑ ÿπÿØÿØÿßŸã ŸÖŸÜ ÿßŸÑŸÖÿ¥ÿ™ÿ®Ÿá ÿ®ÿßŸÜÿÆÿ±ÿßÿ∑ŸáŸÖ ŸÅŸä ÿ£ÿπŸÖÿßŸÑ ÿ•ÿ±Ÿáÿßÿ®Ÿäÿ©"ÿå ŸàŸÅŸÇ ÿ≤ÿπŸÖŸáŸÖ.
ÿ™Ÿàÿ∫ŸÑ ŸÅŸä ÿßŸÑŸÇŸÜŸäÿ∑ÿ±ÿ©
Ÿàÿ£ŸÖÿ≥ ÿßŸÑÿ£ÿ±ÿ®ÿπÿßÿ°ÿå ÿ™Ÿàÿ∫ŸÑÿ™ ŸÇŸàŸëÿ© ŸÖŸÜ ÿ¨Ÿäÿ¥ ÿßŸÑÿßÿ≠ÿ™ŸÑÿßŸÑ ÿßŸÑÿ•ÿ≥ÿ±ÿßÿ¶ŸäŸÑŸä ŸÅŸä ŸÇÿ±Ÿäÿ© ÿßŸÑŸÇÿ≠ÿ∑ÿßŸÜŸäÿ© ŸÅŸä ÿ±ŸäŸÅ ÿßŸÑŸÇŸÜŸäÿ∑ÿ±ÿ©ÿå ŸàÿßŸÜÿ™ÿ¥ÿ±ÿ™ ÿ®ŸäŸÜ ÿßŸÑŸÖŸÜÿßÿ≤ŸÑ ŸàÿßŸÑÿ¥Ÿàÿßÿ±ÿπ ÿ®ÿßŸÑÿ™ÿ≤ÿßŸÖŸÜ ŸÖÿπ ÿ•ÿ∑ŸÑÿßŸÇ ÿßŸÑŸÜÿßÿ± ŸÅŸä ÿßŸÑŸáŸàÿßÿ°ÿå Ÿàÿ≥ÿ∑ ÿ™ÿµÿßÿπÿØ ÿßŸÑÿ™Ÿàÿ™ÿ±ÿßÿ™ ŸÅŸä ÿßŸÑŸÖŸÜÿ∑ŸÇÿ© ÿßŸÑÿ≠ÿØŸàÿØŸäÿ©.
Ÿàÿ£ŸÅÿßÿØ ŸÖÿ±ÿßÿ≥ŸÑ ÿ™ŸÑŸÅÿ≤ŸäŸàŸÜ ÿ≥Ÿàÿ±Ÿäÿß ÿ®ÿ£ŸÜ ÿ¨Ÿäÿ¥ ÿßŸÑÿßÿ≠ÿ™ŸÑÿßŸÑ ÿßŸÜÿ™ÿ¥ÿ± ŸÅŸä ÿ¥Ÿàÿßÿ±ÿπ ÿßŸÑŸÇÿ±Ÿäÿ© Ÿàÿ®ŸäŸÜ ÿßŸÑŸÖŸÜÿßÿ≤ŸÑÿå Ÿàÿ≥ÿ∑ ÿ•ÿ∑ŸÑÿßŸÇ ŸÜÿßÿ± ŸÅŸä ÿßŸÑŸáŸàÿßÿ°ÿå ŸÖÿ¥Ÿäÿ±ÿßŸã ÿ•ŸÑŸâ ÿ£ŸÜ ÿ¨ŸÜŸàÿØ ÿßŸÑÿßÿ≠ÿ™ŸÑÿßŸÑ Ÿàÿ¨ŸëŸáŸàÿß ÿπÿ®ÿ± ŸÖŸÉÿ®ÿ±ÿßÿ™ ÿßŸÑÿµŸàÿ™ ŸÜÿØÿßÿ°ÿßÿ™ ŸÑÿ≥ŸÉÿßŸÜ ÿßŸÑŸÇÿ±Ÿäÿ© ÿ™ÿ∑ÿßŸÑÿ®ŸáŸÖ ÿ®ÿßŸÑÿ™ÿ≤ÿßŸÖ ŸÖŸÜÿßÿ≤ŸÑŸáŸÖ ŸàÿπÿØŸÖ ÿßŸÑÿÆÿ±Ÿàÿ¨ ŸÖŸÜŸáÿß.
ŸàŸäŸàŸÖ ÿßŸÑÿ£ÿ≠ÿØ ÿßŸÑŸÖÿßÿ∂Ÿäÿå ÿ¨ÿ±ŸÅÿ™ ŸÇŸàÿßÿ™ ÿßŸÑÿßÿ≠ÿ™ŸÑÿßŸÑ ÿ£ÿ±ÿßÿ∂Ÿä ÿ≤ÿ±ÿßÿπŸäÿ© ŸÇÿ±Ÿäÿ®ÿ© ŸÖŸÜ ÿßŸÑÿ¥ÿ±Ÿäÿ∑ ÿßŸÑÿ≠ÿØŸàÿØŸä ŸÅŸä ÿ±ŸäŸÅ ÿßŸÑŸÇŸÜŸäÿ∑ÿ±ÿ© ÿßŸÑÿ¨ŸÜŸàÿ®Ÿäÿå ŸàÿµÿßÿØÿ±ÿ™ ŸÇÿ∑ŸäÿπÿßŸã ŸÖŸÜ ÿßŸÑÿ£ÿ∫ŸÜÿßŸÖ ŸäÿπŸàÿØ ŸÑÿ£ÿ≠ÿØ ÿ≥ŸÉÿßŸÜ ÿßŸÑŸÖŸÜÿ∑ŸÇÿ©.
Ÿàÿ™ÿ™ŸÉÿ±ÿ± ÿ®ŸäŸÜ ÿßŸÑÿ≠ŸäŸÜ ŸàÿßŸÑÿ¢ÿÆÿ± ÿπŸÖŸÑŸäÿßÿ™ ÿ™Ÿàÿ∫ŸëŸÑ ŸÑŸÇŸàÿßÿ™ ÿßŸÑÿßÿ≠ÿ™ŸÑÿßŸÑ ÿßŸÑÿ•ÿ≥ÿ±ÿßÿ¶ŸäŸÑŸä ŸÅŸä ÿ±ŸäŸÅŸä ÿßŸÑŸÇŸÜŸäÿ∑ÿ±ÿ© ŸàÿØÿ±ÿπÿßÿå ÿ≠Ÿäÿ´ ÿ™ÿ±ÿ™ŸÉÿ® ÿßŸÜÿ™ŸáÿßŸÉÿßÿ™ ŸÖÿ™ÿπÿØÿØÿ©ÿå ŸÖŸÜ ÿ®ŸäŸÜŸáÿß ÿ™ÿ¨ÿ±ŸäŸÅ ÿßŸÑÿ£ÿ±ÿßÿ∂Ÿä ÿßŸÑÿ≤ÿ±ÿßÿπŸäÿ© Ÿàÿ™ÿØŸÖŸäÿ± ÿßŸÑÿ¢ÿ®ÿßÿ± ŸàŸÖŸÜÿπ ÿßŸÑÿ£ŸáÿßŸÑŸä ŸÖŸÜ ÿßŸÑŸàÿµŸàŸÑ ÿ•ŸÑŸâ ÿ®ÿπÿ∂ ÿßŸÑŸÖŸÜÿßÿ∑ŸÇ Ÿàÿßÿπÿ™ŸÇÿßŸÑ ŸÖÿ≤ÿßÿ±ÿπŸäŸÜ ŸàŸÖÿØŸÜŸäŸäŸÜ ŸàŸÖÿµÿßÿØÿ±ÿ© ÿßŸÑŸÖŸàÿßÿ¥Ÿä ŸÖŸÜ ÿßŸÑÿ≥ŸÉÿßŸÜ.
ÿßŸÑÿßŸÜÿ™ŸáÿßŸÉÿßÿ™ ÿßŸÑÿ•ÿ≥ÿ±ÿßÿ¶ŸäŸÑŸäÿ© ŸÅŸä ÿ≥Ÿàÿ±Ÿäÿß
ÿ™ÿ£ÿ™Ÿä ÿßÿπÿ™ÿØÿßÿ°ÿßÿ™ ÿ¨Ÿäÿ¥ ÿßŸÑÿßÿ≠ÿ™ŸÑÿßŸÑ ŸÅŸä ÿ≥ŸäÿßŸÇ ÿ≥ŸÑÿ≥ŸÑÿ© ŸÖŸÜ ÿßŸÑÿßŸÜÿ™ŸáÿßŸÉÿßÿ™ ÿßŸÑŸÖÿ™ŸÉÿ±ÿ±ÿ© ÿßŸÑÿ™Ÿä ÿ™ŸÜŸÅÿ∞Ÿáÿß ÿßŸÑŸÇŸàÿßÿ™ ÿßŸÑÿ•ÿ≥ÿ±ÿßÿ¶ŸäŸÑŸäÿ© ÿπŸÑŸâ ÿ∑ŸàŸÑ ÿßŸÑÿ≠ÿØŸàÿØ ŸÖÿπ ÿßŸÑÿ¨ŸàŸÑÿßŸÜ ÿßŸÑÿ≥Ÿàÿ±Ÿä ÿßŸÑŸÖÿ≠ÿ™ŸÑÿå ÿ≥Ÿàÿßÿ° ÿπÿ®ÿ± ÿπŸÖŸÑŸäÿßÿ™ ÿ™ÿ¨ÿ≥ÿ≥ Ÿàÿßÿ≥ÿ™ÿ∑ŸÑÿßÿπ ÿ®ÿ∑ÿßÿ¶ÿ±ÿßÿ™ ŸÖÿ≥ŸäŸëÿ±ÿ©ÿå ÿ£Ÿà ÿπÿ®ÿ± ÿ™ÿØÿÆŸÑÿßÿ™ ŸÖÿ®ÿßÿ¥ÿ±ÿ© ÿØÿßÿÆŸÑ ÿßŸÑÿ£ÿ±ÿßÿ∂Ÿä ÿßŸÑÿ≥Ÿàÿ±Ÿäÿ© Ÿàÿßÿπÿ™ŸÇÿßŸÑ ŸÖÿØŸÜŸäŸäŸÜ ŸäÿπŸÖŸÑŸàŸÜ ŸÅŸä ÿßŸÑÿ≤ÿ±ÿßÿπÿ© ÿ£Ÿà ÿßŸÑÿ±ÿπŸä ÿ∂ŸÖŸÜ ÿßŸÑŸÖŸÜÿßÿ∑ŸÇ ÿßŸÑŸÇÿ±Ÿäÿ®ÿ© ŸÖŸÜ ÿÆÿ∑Ÿàÿ∑ ÿßŸÑŸÅÿµŸÑ.
ŸàŸÇÿØ ÿ™ÿµÿßÿπÿØÿ™ ÿßÿπÿ™ÿØÿßÿ°ÿßÿ™ ÿßŸÑÿßÿ≠ÿ™ŸÑÿßŸÑ ÿßŸÑÿ•ÿ≥ÿ±ÿßÿ¶ŸäŸÑŸä ÿπŸÑŸâ ÿ≥Ÿàÿ±Ÿäÿß ÿ®ÿ¥ŸÉŸÑ ŸÖŸÑÿ≠Ÿàÿ∏ ÿπŸÇÿ® ÿ≥ŸÇŸàÿ∑ ŸÜÿ∏ÿßŸÖ ÿßŸÑÿ£ÿ≥ÿØÿå ÿ•ÿ∞ ÿ¥ŸÜŸëÿ™ ŸÇŸàÿßÿ™Ÿá ŸÖÿ¶ÿßÿ™ ÿßŸÑÿ∫ÿßÿ±ÿßÿ™ ÿπŸÑŸâ ŸÖŸàÿßŸÇÿπ ÿπÿ≥ŸÉÿ±Ÿäÿ© ÿ™ÿßÿ®ÿπÿ© ŸÑŸÑÿ¨Ÿäÿ¥ ÿßŸÑÿ≥Ÿàÿ±Ÿä ÿ®ŸáÿØŸÅ ÿ™ÿØŸÖŸäÿ±Ÿáÿß ŸàŸÖŸÜÿπ ÿ•ÿπÿßÿØÿ© ÿ™ÿ£ŸáŸäŸÑ ÿ®ŸÜŸäÿ™Ÿáÿß ÿßŸÑÿ™ÿ≠ÿ™Ÿäÿ©ÿå ÿ™ÿ≤ÿßŸÖŸÜÿßŸã ŸÖÿπ ÿπŸÖŸÑŸäÿßÿ™ ÿ™Ÿàÿ∫ŸÑ ÿ®ÿ±Ÿä ŸÅŸä ÿ£ÿ±ŸäÿßŸÅ ÿØŸÖÿ¥ŸÇ ŸàÿßŸÑŸÇŸÜŸäÿ∑ÿ±ÿ© ŸàÿØÿ±ÿπÿßÿå ÿ≠Ÿäÿ´ ÿ≥Ÿäÿ∑ÿ±ÿ™ ÿπŸÑŸâ ÿßŸÑŸÖŸÜÿ∑ŸÇÿ© ÿßŸÑÿπÿßÿ≤ŸÑÿ©ÿå ÿ´ŸÖ ÿßŸÜÿ™ŸÇŸÑÿ™ ŸÑÿ™ŸÜŸÅŸäÿ∞ ŸÖÿØÿßŸáŸÖÿßÿ™ ŸÅŸä ÿßŸÑŸÖŸÜÿßÿ∑ŸÇ ÿßŸÑÿ≠ÿØŸàÿØŸäÿ©.

author: Redacci√≥n EC
title: Corte IDH requiere al Per√∫ suspender tr√°mite de la ley que limita alcance de delitos de lesa humanidad
text: [1](/lima/sjl-nicole-mesia-castro-suboficial-que-desaparecio-y-fue-encontrada-en-cusco-es-hallada-sin-vida-en-su-vivienda-pnp-ultimas-noticia/) La Corte Interamericana de Derechos Humanos ( [Corte IDH](https://elcomercio.pe/noticias/corte-idh/?ref=ecr/)) requiri√≥ al Estado peruano que se suspenda ‚Äúinmediatamente‚Äù el tr√°mite del proyecto de ley que est√° avanzando en el [Congreso de la Rep√∫blica](https://elcomercio.pe/noticias/congreso-de-la-republica/?ref=ecr/) y que busca restringir los alcances de los delitos de lesa humanidad para que no puedan ser aplicados en casos cometidos antes del 2002. Esto, como parte de una resoluci√≥n adoptada en el proceso que la corte internacional est√° realizando por un pedido de medidas provisionales que hicieron los deudos de los casos Barrios Altos y La Cantuta. Espec√≠ficamente, la Corte IDH requiere al Per√∫ que ‚Äúsuspenda inmediatamente‚Äù el tr√°mite del dictamen del proyecto de ley 6951/2023/CR que busca precisar la ‚Äúaplicaci√≥n y alcances del delio de lesa humanidad y cr√≠menes de guerra en la legislaci√≥n peruana‚Äù. La corte se√±ala que esta suspensi√≥n debe aplicarse hasta que cuenten con todos los elementos para pronunciarse sobre las medidas provisionales y el impacto que tendr√° esta norma en los casos Barrios Altos y La Cantuta que fueron resueltos por este fuero internacional. Asimismo, se procedi√≥ a convocar al Estado peruano, as√≠ como a los representantes de los deudos de Barrios Altos y La Cantuta y a la Comisi√≥n Interamericana de Derechos Humanos (CIDH) a una audiencia p√∫blica virtual para el lunes 17 de junio del 2024 las 8:30 a.m. hora de Costa Rica. En la audiencia, la Corte IDH evaluar√° la solicitud de las v√≠ctimas. El dictamen que deber√° ser objeto de esta suspensi√≥n fue aprobado por el pleno del Congreso en primera votaci√≥n con 60 votos a favor, 36 en contra y 11 abstenciones. Actualmente, se encuentra pendiente de ser sometido a una segunda votaci√≥n antes de ser remitido al Gobierno para su promulgaci√≥n y posterior entrada en vigencia, o para que pueda ser observado y regresado al Parlamento. La propuesta fue promovida por los parlamentarios Jos√© Cueto (Honor y Democracia) y Fernando Rospigliosi (Fuerza Popular). Plantea que, como el Estatuto de Roma de la Corte Penal Internacional fue aprobado reci√©n el 1 de julio 2002; y a Convenci√≥n sobre la Imprescriptibilidad de los Cr√≠menes de Guerra y de los Cr√≠menes de Lesa Humanidad el 9 de noviembre de 2003, respectivamente, los delitos cometidos antes de esas fechas ‚Äúprescriben en los plazos establecidos en la ley nacional‚Äù, eliminando as√≠ la imprescriptibilidad de estos casos.
